abstract_ssm: One large bound account book of an unnamed Brooklyn hardware store during the period 1876 to 1880.  Entries detail transactions relating to store merchandise and property rental.  The store is believed to have been located in the neighborhood of Brooklyn Heights, as several entries toward the front of the book mention rents paid at 24 Old Slip Street and 78 Front Street.
subject_ssm: Hardware stores |z New York (State) |z Kings County
